{{Wired embedded system |brand=Verbatim |model=MediaShare |revision=Mini (097329) |upc=023942973294 |asin=B0047T7PTO |price=90 |est_release_date=11/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=USI |manuf_model=Topkick 0281 |manuf_rev=3.0 |type=NAS enclosure, media streamer |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6281 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=HY27UF082G2B |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS1G83EFR |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=4 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200,8,N,1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116R |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=4-port USB 2.0 Hub Controller;Alcor Micro;AU6254;;1; ,,, 30V, 8.8A P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS4435BZ;;1; ,,, 30V, 7A N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS8984;;1; ,,, 5V/12V Synchronous Buck PWM DC/DC Controller;Richtek;RT8105;;1; ,,, 1A Low Dropout Positive Adjustable Regulator;Analog Integrations;AIC1117A;;2; |flags=RTC w/ battery backup |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.4.27; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.22.18;Axentra HipServ OS; |oui_eth=00:27:13 }} {{TagLine|Mini Home Network Storage}} :[http://support.mediashare.myverbatim.com/en/ Support page]
"TOPKICK028I/128I REV 3.0" and "2010.06.10" :is silkscreened on the board.
4x USB ports are contained on a daughterboard with :hub controller chip connected via 10-pin header.
